name: PoolManager
description: Core contract that manages the state and lifecycle of Uniswap v4 pools; responsible for collecting liquidity, swaps and fee logic

name: UniversalRouter
description: Router contract that unifies multiple swap routes and handles multi‑hop trades across pools
notes: From official Uniswap v4 Base Sepolia address list【848337322619475†L344-L360】

name: PositionManager
description: Manages positions on behalf of users and handles minting of LP NFTs for Uniswap v4 pools

name: StateView
description: Read‑only contract that exposes pool state variables, price and liquidity information

name: Quoter
description: Utility contract that simulates swaps to quote expected output amounts without executing them

name: PoolSwapTest
description: Testing contract used by Uniswap to validate swap behaviour on the Base Sepolia deployment

name: PoolModifyLiquidityTest
description: Testing contract for liquidity modification operations on the Base Sepolia deployment

name: Permit2
description: Token permit contract used for managing approvals and permissions across different Uniswap components
